title: Sapphire Robe
summaries: The Sapphire Robe is an Armor item parts of the Wizard set that can be worn in the shirt slot. It is the third weakest Gem Robe.

Wearing the Wizard Hat alongside the Sapphire Robe provides a set bonus of +10% magic critical strike chance while wearing a Magic Hat alongside it provides a set bonus of +60 Mana. Any leg-slot equipment can be worn with these set bonuses remaining intact.
